sell.title: I don't know how to Sell

countries.us: How to sell in United State
countries.gb: How to sell in United Kingdom

content.0: Our journey began with a simple idea
content.1: What if finding a home abroad could be as easy as buying one nearby?
content.2: From breaking language barriers to navigating foreign laws and currencies, we saw a chance to simplify the process and make international home-buying accessible.
content.3: I’m Mitchell, founder of Viva Ideal, but this isn’t just my story—it’s a shared vision of a passionate team.
content.4: Together, we’re building more than a platform; we’re creating a community that connects people to homes, cultures, and opportunities beyond borders, driven by our commitment to making this dream a reality.
content.h1: Welcome to Viva Ideal: Your Gateway to Global Real Estate

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To ensure everyone has the opportunity to live in a beautiful, safe, and affordable home, empowering them to build a secure future and a better life.

how.title: Our How
how.content: By reducing friction and connecting people from diverse cultural backgrounds; enabling exploration beyond familiar surroundings.

1.title: Remote Work Boom
1.body: Rising global remote work boosts productivity and opportunities.

2.title: Income Savings
2.body: Lower living costs in Latin America attract remote workers.

3.title: US Time Zones
3.body: Alignment with US time zones simplifies remote collaboration.

5.title: Economic Upswing
5.body: Remote worker influx drives local wealth and economic growth.
